name: Luminous Limits
description:
In late 19th century New Zealand, a small ball of light must light lighhouses to save incoming ships from certain peril. Bats, clouds and an enveloping darkness seek to snuff out the light, but have you got what it takes to shine?

Welcome to Luminous Limits, a Game Jam Aotearoa entry using the theme "light & dark" by team Fiery Fireflies.
